title: Feng Yu

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: At night, visit another player, you will attempt to kill them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
If the attack fails, attempt to transfur them instead.
You may only make 3 kills. And they only count if they're successful.

desc:
Post 2900
*"Dr.████████ made this thing, turns out, it's a vicious predator, and will prefer to kill its prey. Depends on its mood. Poor doc was found dead a week after the thing was made. I've been trying to get K to kill this thing for months now, but he's not letting me hear the end of it." -Dr.██████, MIT.*
